Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory82.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Villier', 3: "Looks like malicious code was uploaded five hours ago. The machine was still at the Pulao Crew's ordinance factory at that time.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Qu', 3: "That's not a place someone can just waltz in all willy-nilly.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Villier', 3: 'Got that right. Its anti-tracking software is really sophisticated, too. Redundant code is generated every 10 minutes to hide the malicious code.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Villier', 3: "They must have planned this for some time. Had it not been for my habit of always leaving a backdoor in all of my programs, I wouldn't have been able to figure out what was wrong.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: 'Only a handful of people in Kowloong have the authority and technology to pull something like this off.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Villier', 3: 'Got that right. Either the hackers I took care of last year or the members of the Chaofeng Crew you took in.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Villier', 3: "Aside from those few, there's gotta be someone with high security coverage.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Villier', 3: 'Got it. This is the work of "Cradle".', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Villier', 3: 'Looks like this hacker organization is finally reemerging in Kowloong after supposedly dying years ago.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Villier', 3: "They may have tried to mask their payments several times over, but they're receiving regular payments from...", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Villier stares at his mobile access terminal for some time before finishing his sentence.'}
{2: 'Villier', 3: 'Hmph, humans truly are hopeless. It appears even relatives can be eradicated, so long as they stand in the way.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Qu', 3: '...Why so flustered?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Villier', 3: "Flustered? I've never been more calm.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Villier', 3: 'Humanity has merely confirmed my beliefs every step of the way. After all the anger dissipates, hilarity is all that remains.', 4: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgCg/Cgqz1901.jpg'}
{3: 'Despite learning that I have been betrayed, I still feel devoid of emotions.'}
{1: 'RImgBg1BlowUp'}
{3: "Seeing Villier fraught with anger, I'm suddenly overcome with ideas never to have crossed my mind."}
{3: 'Humans have an array of emotions far more profound than just a single noun in a set of data.'}
{3: "Brother's fear and anger, Villier's loneliness and disgust, and the family's love and gratification—all intertwined with each other."}
{3: 'I overflow with emotional ties, none of which stem from the heart.'}
{3: 'My family taught me humility, and humility abstains oneself from brandishing this word.'}
{3: "But perhaps I am as perfect as Villier and the others say. I'm always able to respond to others with the appropriate attitude and meet their expectations."}
{3: 'This has been my duty since birth—to be a lonely, powerful, and false Supreme.'}
{3: 'The Supreme is a mere facade, weaved through lies to dance for the masses.'}
{3: "I will fulfill my family's mission, live up to the expectations of the people, and refrain from any actions ill-suited for the Supreme."}
{3: 'A ruin devoid of warmth lies beneath my shell, drowned in indifference.'}

{3: 'To fill these emotionless ruins, I try my best to imitate and show concern for others in an attempt to understand the deeper meaning contained in these words, so I can try my best to act like a normal person.'}
{3: "But the repairs I've made on these ruins merely end up disappearing into the sea without a trace."}
{3: 'Some things just cannot be imitated.'}
